abstract: russian child model called ` most beautiful girl in the world '
article: a russian 6-year-old girl who already has a modeling career is being called the `` most beautiful girl in the world . '' anastasia knyazeva has over 500,000 instagram followers on an account her mother runs , which features images of knyazeva during modeling shoots and other events , plus some personal photos , according to yahoo lifestyle . the instagram posts get hundreds of comments each from fans all over the world . the young girl has large , striking blue eyes and doll-like features that have made her a worldwide favorite , the daily mail reported . some have criticized anastasia 's mother for putting her on social media at such a young age , yahoo reported .

`` the problem with baby branding is that firstly you are sharing information about them without their permission , and secondly you are creating a voice which is n't actually theirs , and this means that people are getting to know you and not your child , '' psychologist emma kenny said , yahoo reported . kenny also pointed out that online grooming is a growing problem and hoped that the young girl did not have access to the social media account . children ca n't really give consent to have their photos and details of their lives put on social media , but should be consulted as they grow older and their wishes respected , kenny said , yahoo reported .

knyazeva has followed after several other young models who were declared the most beautiful girl in the world at young ages , including french model thylane blondeau , now 16 , and fellow russian kristina pimenova , who now lives in the u. s. and has a modeling contract with la models at age 11 , the daily mail reported .
